metadata.name: Victory Lap Dialog
metadata.description:
By default, the victory lap dialog is only displayed after defeating The Lamb. This mod adds it to the rest of the ending bosses after a big chest has dropped. There's 2 exceptions: if you beat Isaac while holding The Polaroid or if you beat Satan while holding The Negative.
Mega Satan doesn't always drop a chest, but instead can go directly to a cutscene. To fix this, you can use one of these mods: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2667845009]NO Mega Satan auto cutscene[/url] or [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=938928749]AlwaysVoid[/url].
If you're headed to The Beast then I'd suggest using: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2228672036]Victory Laps[/url].
This mod uses a shader. I'd recommend installing: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2661947271]Shader Crash Fix[/url].
